text: Hedyosmum burgerianum is a species of plant in the Chloranthaceae family. It is endemic to Panama. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Mitré, M. 1998. Hedyosmum burgerianum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Flora of Panama burgerianum Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hedyosmum burgerianum
